Text: This post was originally published on this site Vitaly Melnikov   Â© Stanislav Krasilnikov/TASS   MOSCOW. November 11. /TASS/. The International Swimming Federation (FINA) has banned Russian swimmer Vitaly Melnikov for eight years after a repeat violation of anti-doping rules, the web portal Swimswam reported on Friday.   The swimmer who was earlier suspended for two years had his sample taken on March 29, 2016. The sample tested positive.   {{item.group_date}}
